text.en: When it comes time for me to die,
text.en-trans: dak kyang namzhik chiwé dü kyi tsé

text.en: May the Jamgön Lama, master of extensive scriptural traditions,2
Guide me to the pure realm of Sukhāvatī,
text.en-trans: dewachen gyi zhing der drang né kyang

text.en: Where I may behold the sublime face of Amitābha.
text.en-trans: öpakmé pé zhal chok tongwar dzö
